why-me.heading: Why me
why-me.p: Turning problems into clarity drives my inventive approach on creating websites, achieving results that matter.

skills.challenge: I am always happy to learn new skills. Just tell me what you need.

projects.join: Plan smarter and get more done with a visual Kanban board designed for simplicity and control. Create tasks, move them through stages, and watch your projects come to life.
projects.pokedex: Explore the world of Pokémon with this interactive Pokédex powered by the PokéAPI. Search for your favorite Pokémon and discover detailed stats, abilities, types, height, and more.
projects.los-virales: Experience a post-apocalyptic zombie survival game powered by object-oriented JavaScript. Defeat the hordes of undead and see if you can beat the game.

references.heading: Need a teamplayer?
references.p: Here's what my colleagues say about me.
references.pokedex: Leon had to develop, format and deliver content in collaboration with the team members. He is a reliable and friendly person.
references.los-virales: He is a trustworthy teamplayer and can cope with the stress of deadlines. Structured work and clear code.
references.join: He is a reliable and friendly person. Work in a structured way and write a clear code. I recommend him as a colleague.
